channel.title: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]
channel.description: How would I make it if I used item ID "1" on item ID "2" and has a certain level it turns into item ID "3"?

item.title: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:


its right there just copy it and change the item IDs

its right there just copy it and change the item IDs

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]

item.title: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:8, topic:393301”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=490470.msg3586568#msg3586568 date=1304222893]

Hmmm… No Idea why it does that.
One tip though. At the start of the command where you have playerlevel [15] > 89 do >= 89. Cause > 89 means higher than meaning you need 90

Did that, thank you very much.
Basically, that’s my code above, and when I add a second “}” to the end of each one (or third, fourth, etc. etc.), it gets errors. I will edit this post with a screenie of some of the errors in a minute.

EDIT: Again, current code:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

/**

  • @author Ryan / Lmctruck30
    */

import server.model.items.UseItem;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;

public class ItemOnItem implements PacketType {

@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	int usedWithSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int itemUsedSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
	int useWith = c.playerItems[usedWithSlot] - 1;
	int itemUsed = c.playerItems[itemUsedSlot] - 1;
	UseItem.ItemonItem(c, itemUsed, useWith);

if (c.playerLevel[15] > 88 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2436) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(261)) {
if (itemUsed == 2436 && useWith == 261 || itemUsed == 261 && useWith == 2436) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2436, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2436), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(261, c.getItems().getItemSlot(261), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15308, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Attack (4)”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 88 herblore to make an Extreme Attack potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 89 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2440) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(267)) {
if (itemUsed == 2440 && useWith == 267 || itemUsed == 267 && useWith == 2440) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2440, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2440), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(267, c.getItems().getItemSlot(267), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15312, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Strength (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 89 herblore to make an Extreme Strength potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 90 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2442) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2481)) {
if (itemUsed == 2442 && useWith == 2481 || itemUsed == 2481 && useWith == 2442) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2442, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2442), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(2481, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2481), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15316, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Defence (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 90 herblore to make an Extreme Defence potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 96 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15324) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15320) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15316) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15312) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15308)) {
if (itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15320) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(15324, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15324), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15320, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15320), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15316, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15316), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15312, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15312), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15308, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15308), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15332, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Overload (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 96 herblore to make an Overload potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 91 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(3040) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(9594)) {
if (itemUsed == 3040 && useWith == 9594 || itemUsed == 9594 && useWith == 3040) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(3040, c.getItems().getItemSlot(3040), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(9594, c.getItems().getItemSlot(9594), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15320, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Magic (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 91 herblore to make an Extreme Magic potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 92 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2444) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(12539)) {
if (itemUsed == 2444 && useWith == 12539 || itemUsed == 12539 && useWith == 2444) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2444, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2444), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(12539, c.getItems().getItemSlot(12539), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15324, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Ranging (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 92 herblore to make an Extreme Ranging potion.”);
return;
}
}
}
}[/code]

Screenie of Errors

2ebe4r8.jpg639×658

[/quote]

ur servr not pakaje so u ned fix.[/quote]
I do not understand what I have to do.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Did that, thank you very much.
Basically, that’s my code above, and when I add a second “}” to the end of each one (or third, fourth, etc. etc.), it gets errors. I will edit this post with a screenie of some of the errors in a minute.

EDIT: Again, current code:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

/**

  • @author Ryan / Lmctruck30
    */

import server.model.items.UseItem;
import server.model.players.Client;

public class ItemOnItem implements PacketType {

	UseItem.ItemonItem(c, itemUsed, useWith);

if (c.playerLevel[15] > 88 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2436) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(261)) {
if (itemUsed == 2436 && useWith == 261 || itemUsed == 261 && useWith == 2436) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2436, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2436), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(261, c.getItems().getItemSlot(261), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15308, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Attack (4)”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 88 herblore to make an Extreme Attack potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 89 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2440) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(267)) {
if (itemUsed == 2440 && useWith == 267 || itemUsed == 267 && useWith == 2440) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2440, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2440), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(267, c.getItems().getItemSlot(267), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15312, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Strength (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 89 herblore to make an Extreme Strength potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 90 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2442) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2481)) {
if (itemUsed == 2442 && useWith == 2481 || itemUsed == 2481 && useWith == 2442) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2442, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2442), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(2481, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2481), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15316, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Defence (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 90 herblore to make an Extreme Defence potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 96 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15324) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15320) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15316) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15312) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15308)) {
if (itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15320) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(15324, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15324), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15320, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15320), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15316, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15316), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15312, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15312), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15308, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15308), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15332, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Overload (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 96 herblore to make an Overload potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 91 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(3040) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(9594)) {
if (itemUsed == 3040 && useWith == 9594 || itemUsed == 9594 && useWith == 3040) {

Did that, thank you very much.
Basically, that’s my code above, and when I add a second “}” to the end of each one (or third, fourth, etc. etc.), it gets errors. I will edit this post with a screenie of some of the errors in a minute.

EDIT: Again, current code:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

/**

  • @author Ryan / Lmctruck30
    */

import server.model.items.UseItem;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;

public class ItemOnItem implements PacketType {

@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	int usedWithSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int itemUsedSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
	int useWith = c.playerItems[usedWithSlot] - 1;
	int itemUsed = c.playerItems[itemUsedSlot] - 1;
	UseItem.ItemonItem(c, itemUsed, useWith);

if (c.playerLevel[15] > 88 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2436) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(261)) {
if (itemUsed == 2436 && useWith == 261 || itemUsed == 261 && useWith == 2436) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2436, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2436), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(261, c.getItems().getItemSlot(261), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15308, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Attack (4)”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 88 herblore to make an Extreme Attack potion.”);
return;
}
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 89 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2440) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(267)) {
if (itemUsed == 2440 && useWith == 267 || itemUsed == 267 && useWith == 2440) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2440, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2440), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(267, c.getItems().getItemSlot(267), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15312, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Strength (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 89 herblore to make an Extreme Strength potion.”);

if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 90 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2442) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2481)) {
if (itemUsed == 2442 && useWith == 2481 || itemUsed == 2481 && useWith == 2442) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2442, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2442), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(2481, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2481), 1);

} else {

if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 96 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15324) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15320) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15316) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15312) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15308)) {
if (itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15324 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15320 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15316 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15312 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15324 || itemUsed == 15308 && useWith == 15320) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(15324, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15324), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15320, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15320), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15316, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15316), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15312, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15312), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(15308, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15308), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15332, 1);

}
} else {

return;
}

if (itemUsed == 3040 && useWith == 9594 || itemUsed == 9594 && useWith == 3040) {

item.title: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“Bumm85, post:4, topic:393301”]Yea you add it in itemonitem then save and compile.
If you get an error post it here[/quote]
My itemonitem class:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

/**

  • @author Ryan / Lmctruck30
    */

import server.model.items.UseItem;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;

public class ItemOnItem implements PacketType {

@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	int usedWithSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int itemUsedSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
	int useWith = c.playerItems[usedWithSlot] - 1;
	int itemUsed = c.playerItems[itemUsedSlot] - 1;
	UseItem.ItemonItem(c, itemUsed, useWith);

if (c.playerLevel[15] > 88 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2436) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(261)) {
if (itemUsed == 2436 && useWith == 261 || itemUsed == 261 && useWith == 2436) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2436, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2436), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(261, c.getItems().getItemSlot(261), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15308, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Attack (4)”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 88 herblore to make an Extreme Attack potion.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] > 89 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2440) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(267)) {
if (itemUsed == 2440 && useWith == 267 || itemUsed == 267 && useWith == 2440) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2440, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2440), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(267, c.getItems().getItemSlot(267), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15312, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Strength (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 89 herblore to make an Extreme Strength potion.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] > 90 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2442) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2481)) {
if (itemUsed == 2442 && useWith == 2481 || itemUsed == 2481 && useWith == 2442) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2442, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2442), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(2481, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2481), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15316, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Defence (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 90 herblore to make an Extreme Defence potion.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] > 91 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(3040) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(9594)) {
if (itemUsed == 3040 && useWith == 9594 || itemUsed == 9594 && useWith == 3040) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(3040, c.getItems().getItemSlot(3040), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(9594, c.getItems().getItemSlot(9594), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15320, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Magic (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 91 herblore to make an Extreme Magic potion.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerLevel[15] > 92 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2444) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(12539)) {
if (itemUsed == 2444 && useWith == 12539 || itemUsed == 12539 && useWith == 2444) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2444, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2444), 1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(12539, c.getItems().getItemSlot(12539), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15324, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You receive an Extreme Ranging (4).”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 92 herblore to make an Extreme Ranging potion.”);
return;
}
}
}
}[/code]

For some reason, when I try to make Extreme Strength, it says “You need 88 herblore”, still thinking it’s in the Extreme Attack method. I tried adding another “}” to the end of each method but I got many errors (Not 100).

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(2) { if (itemUsed == 1 && useWith == 2 || itemUsed == 2 && useWith == 1) { c.getItems().deleteItem(4151, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4151), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(11791, c.getItems().getItemSlot(11791), 1); c.getItems().addItem(3, 1); c.sendMessage("You get item 3"); } } else { return; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Item Used On A Certain Item Turns Into Another Item?[PI]

item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

How would I make it if I used item ID “1” on item ID “2” and has a certain level it turns into item ID “3”?
